meanings.definition: Not consisting of or relating to plastics.
meanings.sent1: The eco-friendly company only uses nonplastics materials for their packaging.
meanings.sent2: She prefers nonplastics containers for storing food.
meanings.sent3: The nonplastics picnic set was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and nonplastics as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The nonplastics toys were safe for children to play with.

meanings.definition: Not made of or containing plastics.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful sculpture using nonplastics materials.
meanings.sent2: I bought a nonplastics water bottle to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The nonplastics chair looked like it was made of wood.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was clear and nonplastics, like a bell ringing.
meanings.sent5: The nonplastics bag was durable and environmentally friendly.
